Slimy Sam's unique shell design allows him to glide effortlessly across the ground, leaving all the other snails in his wake.
As Slimy Sam crosses the finish line first, he is crowned the fastest snail in the world and becomes a local hero.
The villagers celebrate Slimy Sam's victory with a parade, and he becomes the symbol of their community.
Slimy Sam's speed and unique shell design attract the attention of a team of scientists who want to study his abilities.
The scientists conduct experiments on Slimy Sam, and they discover that his shell is made of a special type of shell that allows him to move faster than any other snail.
